thread.title: Will axing employees make Twitter 'faster' and 'nimbler'? CEO Jack Dorsey thinks so - newsR
thread.title_full: Will axing employees make Twitter 'faster' and 'nimbler'? CEO Jack Dorsey thinks so - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Will axing employees make Twitter 'faster' and 'nimbler'? CEO Jack Dorsey thinks so - newsR
text: Twitter Chief Executive Jack Dorsey may have spoken too soon in June when he described the company's direction as “extremely strong and beautiful.”The San Francisco microblogging site — a laggard in a world of fast-action social media companies such as Facebook and Snapchat — will slice 336 jobs,... »
